post.text:
Equality is on the ballot.
Justice is on the ballot.
Our progress is on the ballot. 
IWillVote.com

comment.author: Conor
comment.text: It's the demand of present scenario to vote to Hillary. So, American are requested to take the right decision. A simple fault can suffer Americans. So vote to Hillary....... She is absolutely capable to run the Whitehouse and lead America......

replies.author: Conor
replies.text: May be or may not. But it's the demand of time....

replies.author: Mallory
replies.text: At this point Trump is better than her for the US... Now that the investigations have been reopened, it is important that the voters understood that the sole POSSIBILITY that the USA might find itself without a President, to be replaced by its VP in case she is judged guilty, IS A RISK AMERICA CANNOT TAKE. It would destroy its stability AND CREDIBILITY in the global scenario.

replies.author: Conor
replies.text: Think the American side, not the other issues at this stage....

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Why don't you keep your nose out of our politics and focus on your own country.

replies.author: Conor
replies.text: I am not a politician, just supporter....
